title: Stuck in Champion Select
body: My mates and I are stuck in champ select. Nothing is loading. Anyone else getting this?

replies.body: Same issue here D::
My reconnect button is broken wut, was in champ select then it didn't start and now can't 'reconnect' {{item:3070}}  {{champion:36}} {{item:3070}}
same
Same, was in a ranked champ select and they diaslbed it and now i cant connect to the game

My game just ended and was unable to skip(end game wasnt loading). Relogged and I have Reconnect but no game to connect to.

 I wouldn't bother playing any games for tonight... Go play something else, watch some anime, fap, sleep (not in that order unless you want to :/ )

> [{quoted}](name=TOXIC Devourer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MXgviA6E,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-11-06T11:12:34.984+0000)
>
> My game just ended and was unable to skip(end game wasnt loading). Relogged and I have Reconnect but no game to connect to.
> 
>  I wouldn't bother playing any games for tonight... Go play something else, watch some anime, fap, sleep (not in that order unless you want to :/ )

I'm going to do that in the opposite order {{champion:245}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Yeah same here, this is shit.
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce
Same issue here, tried restarting client and now stuck on reconnect screen unable to connect to anything
Had it yesterday, when playing Rengar. Had to restart client. Luckily though everyone else was still in loading screen, so i didn't miss on anything :D

Hey guys,

I know it sucks when there are issues, out Live team is on it you can check out updates here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/yLWijwsJ-connection-issues-6th-november-2015-updated-1015pm-aedt

We are trying to resolve the issues asap.

Same thing just happened to me.

My game just loaded after waiting 5 minutes but there are no team mates or opposing team just me in game.
And it looks like it's starting to work. Been in limbo and it's started loading into the game

that second when i stuck in Champion Select, i was thinking about Y even people using DDOS when they are playing normal l0l lmfao
{{champion:32}}
Omg same here was in champion select left then tryed to reload then i tryed to reconnect and then it doesnt let me click it
almost like everyone is getting it and there's no cure found atm if anyone finds the cure plz speak up
Man this stuff always happens to OCE servers aye.. never used to happen when I played on the NA servers {{item:3070}}

Was just stuck in the champ select and everyone had locked in, game was about to begin, never did, 2 people reconnected and got back into chat, i tried to reconnect and now i login it asks me to reconnect to the game in progress, but if i click reconnect nothing happens - now i guess i get to enjoy the leaver buster queue on the house.
yeah i am sever cooked
Same here. THE BATTLE IS still ABOUT TO BEGIN after 20 mins.
It'll just be the servers. DW they will do loss prevented.
even reconnect is not working as well :({{champion:161}}

Not until u guys leave
SO DO NOT LEAVE
same
Same issue here, we are all stuck in champ select however can still type in team chat.
Anyone know how to fix it, this is fooked?

Same dude
I cant go onto my other account as well
**RITO PLZ FIX THIS**
yeah i'm stuck and tried to reload client and cant reconnect anymore
Me too, can't start the game even I try to quit and reconnect{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
